name: iCSeeHome(JLink)
0:
”Alexa,turn on smart plug”
”Alexa,turn off smart plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
iCSee Home(JLink) products help you control home appliance. You can simply ask Alexa to turn on or turn off your smart devices.
There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust your smart devices - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo.

HOW TO GET CONNECTED:
1. Search the "iCSee Home(JLink)" skill on Alexa app
2. Tap the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your iCSee Home(JLink) account and password to link your iCSee Home(JLink) account
4. Select a device to bind
5. After your iCSee Home(JLink) account has been successfully linked. 

TIPS: To use this skill, you need to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the iCSee Home(JLink) App.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, turn on smartplug
- Alexa, turn off smartplug
